title: Navigating Tough Issues in Your Family, Part 5
itunes:author: John Fuller & Danny Huerta
itunes:summary:
John and Danny discuss how listening to understand and not always to respond can build a bond of trust with your child.

Get Dr. Mike Bechtle's book Dealing with the Elephant in the Room for your donation of any amount!
